name.zh_cn: 某胡子学生会长的寒假

desc.en: Cherino has rented out an entire hot springs resort for her winter vacation, but unable to deal with her boredom, she challenges Sensei to a game of table tennis.
desc.jp: Cherino has rented out an entire hot springs resort for her winter vacation, but unable to deal with her boredom, she challenges Sensei to a game of table tennis.
desc.zh_cn: 为了尽情享受悠闲的寒假时光，{cf洁莉诺}特地租下了整座温泉浴场。抵抗不了休假的无聊，{cf洁莉诺}向老师提议来进行一场桌球比赛。

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

club.jp: レッドウィンター事務局

hobby.en: Doling out demerits, purging, snowball fights

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

club.jp: レッドウィンター事務局

hobby.en: Doling out demerits, purging, snowball fights

desc.en: Cherino hears that hot spring eggs are as tasty as pudding and proceeds to dump eggs into the hot spring to try boiling them. Cherino is disappointed upon trying one, lamenting that it just tastes like a regular hard-boiled egg.
desc.jp: Cherino hears that hot spring eggs are as tasty as pudding and proceeds to dump eggs into the hot spring to try boiling them. Cherino is disappointed upon trying one, lamenting that it just tastes like a regular hard-boiled egg.
desc.zh_cn: 由于听说温泉蛋的味道不输给布丁，{cf洁莉诺}便把{cn供给部}仓库中存放的鸡蛋搜刮一空，并且通通丢到温泉池内煮成温泉蛋。然而，在品尝过温泉蛋的滋味后，{cf洁莉诺}却发现温泉蛋的味道和一般的水煮蛋几乎一样，感到非常失望。

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

club.jp: レッドウィンター事務局

hobby.en: Doling out demerits, purging, snowball fights

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.zh_cn: 某胡子学生会长的寒假

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

club.jp: レッドウィンター事務局

hobby.en: Doling out demerits, purging, snowball fights

desc.en: Cherino decides to oil her mustache to prevent it from getting wet as she bathes in the hot spring. However, the toasted sesame seed oil she uses has such a strong scent that she is forced to go without her mustache for a while.
desc.jp: Cherino decides to oil her mustache to prevent it from getting wet as she bathes in the hot spring. However, the toasted sesame seed oil she uses has such a strong scent that she is forced to go without her mustache for a while.
desc.zh_cn: 为了避免自己的胡子在泡温泉时弄湿，{cf洁莉诺}特地在胡子上抹了一点油，只不过由于她使用的是味道浓烈的芝麻油，因此她后来有好一阵子都只能过着没有胡子的生活。

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

club.jp: レッドウィンター事務局

hobby.en: Doling out demerits, purging, snowball fights

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

club.jp: レッドウィンター事務局

hobby.en: Doling out demerits, purging, snowball fights

desc.en: Cherino receives fruit-flavored milk from Sensei as a gift to comfort her over her mustache. Cherino is delighted by her milk mustache but ends up getting a stomachache from drinking far too much milk.
desc.jp: Cherino receives fruit-flavored milk from Sensei as a gift to comfort her over her mustache. Cherino is delighted by her milk mustache but ends up getting a stomachache from drinking far too much milk.
desc.zh_cn: 为了安慰失去胡子的{cf洁莉诺}，老师便特地买了一瓶水果牛奶给她。由于喝完牛奶后，嘴边会多一圈看起来很像胡子的白色牛奶渍，因此{cf洁莉诺}便从此爱上了牛奶。不幸的是，因为{cf洁莉诺}一直不停地喝牛奶，所以她后来便开始疯狂拉肚子。

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

club.jp: レッドウィンター事務局

hobby.en: Doling out demerits, purging, snowball fights

desc.en: Sensei visits the hot springs resort at Cherino's request and finds her bath time rubber duck. Cherino huffs, saying that the rubber duck isn't to her liking, but Sensei suggests that she try taking a bath with it and Cherino accepts.
desc.jp: Sensei visits the hot springs resort at Cherino's request and finds her bath time rubber duck. Cherino huffs, saying that the rubber duck isn't to her liking, but Sensei suggests that she try taking a bath with it and Cherino accepts.
desc.zh_cn: 收到{cf洁莉诺}的联系后，老师来到了温泉浴场，并且看见了{cf洁莉诺}的洗澡用「橡胶小鸭」。{cf洁莉诺}耍脾气说自己不喜欢橡胶小鸭，但老师提议她和橡胶小鸭娃娃一起洗澡看看，{cf洁莉诺}接受了提议。

name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

club.jp: レッドウィンター事務局

hobby.en: Doling out demerits, purging, snowball fights

profile.en:
The president of Red Winter Federal Academy who came to Hot Springs Resort No. 227 to enjoy a vacation.

At first, she was planning to demolish the resort that Spec Ops built without her permission, but satisfied with the hospitality of Nodoka and the Spec Ops students, she's decided to extend her stay indefinitely. She doesn't really enjoy getting into the hot springs despite how much she likes resting at the resort and eating its food.
profile.jp:
レッドウィンター連邦学園所属、227号温泉郷を伸び伸びと楽しんでいる生徒会長。

最初は温泉郷が自分の許可も無しに建てられたという事実が気に食わず、そんなものは撤去して粛清せねばと考えて、温泉地へとやってきたチェリノ。しかし到着早々ノドカたちの懐柔によって一転、温泉郷を満喫することになった。温泉郷そのものや食べ物には満足しているものの、どうやら温泉自体はさほど好きではない様子。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
红冬联邦学园所属，悠哉地享受227号温泉乡的「红冬事务局」学生会长。

最开始切里诺对未经自己批准而建成温泉乡一事十分不爽，打算把那种东西拆除并肃清而来到了温泉乡。
但刚一到目的地，原本的想法就被和香等人的殷勤服务完全扭转，尽情享受了温泉乡。
对温泉乡本身和食物非常满意，但看来对温泉本身并不怎么喜欢。
profile.zh_cn_tw:
赤冬联邦学园所属，于227号温泉浴场享乐的学生会长。

最初虽然无法容忍在未经自己许可下建设温泉浴场，认为这种东西必须撤除并肃清才行。然而，抵达后马上被和香她们说服，在温泉浴场尽情享受了一番。虽然对于温泉浴场和食物感到满足，但好像不太喜欢温泉本身。
profile.zh_cn_cn:
来227号温泉乡度假的红冬会长。

最初对特别班擅自建造的温泉浴场感到十分不满，但在体验了和香以及特别班成员们的招待后，决定留在温泉浴场休息。对温泉浴场的休息设施和食物非常满意，反而对温泉浴本身没什么兴趣。

gacha.en: Kneel before the magnificence of Purginator No. 1!
gacha.jp: 「粛清君1号」の前に、跪くが良い！
gacha.zh_cn_jp: 在「粛清君1号」面前，还不快跪下！
gacha.zh_cn_tw: 在「肃清君1号」的面前，跪下吧！
gacha.zh_cn_cn: 在【铲除1号】的威严前跪下吧！

intro.en: Cold is nothing to me, the Master Scribe of Red Winter Academy.
intro.jp:
どれだけ寒い場所だとしても関係ない！
なんたっておいらは、
レッドウィンター連邦学園の偉大な書記長だからな！
intro.zh_cn_jp:
どれだけ寒い場所だとしても関係ない！
なんたっておいらは、
レッドウィンター連邦学園の偉大な書記長だからな！
intro.zh_cn_tw:
无论是再怎么冷的地方都没关系！
毕竟咱可是，
赤冬学园伟大的书记长呢！

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

club.jp: レッドウィンター事務局

hobby.en: Doling out demerits, purging, snowball fights

desc.en: Cherino receives fruit-flavored milk from Sensei as a gift to comfort her over her mustache. Cherino is delighted by her milk mustache but ends up getting a stomachache from drinking far too much milk.
desc.jp: Cherino receives fruit-flavored milk from Sensei as a gift to comfort her over her mustache. Cherino is delighted by her milk mustache but ends up getting a stomachache from drinking far too much milk.
desc.zh_cn: 为了安慰失去胡子的{cf洁莉诺}，老师便特地买了一瓶水果牛奶给她。由于喝完牛奶后，嘴边会多一圈看起来很像胡子的白色牛奶渍，因此{cf洁莉诺}便从此爱上了牛奶。不幸的是，因为{cf洁莉诺}一直不停地喝牛奶，所以她后来便开始疯狂拉肚子。

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

club.jp: レッドウィンター事務局

hobby.en: Doling out demerits, purging, snowball fights

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

club.jp: レッドウィンター事務局

hobby.en: Doling out demerits, purging, snowball fights

desc.en: Sensei visits the hot springs resort at Cherino's request and finds her bath time rubber duck. Cherino huffs, saying that the rubber duck isn't to her liking, but Sensei suggests that she try taking a bath with it and Cherino accepts.
desc.jp: Sensei visits the hot springs resort at Cherino's request and finds her bath time rubber duck. Cherino huffs, saying that the rubber duck isn't to her liking, but Sensei suggests that she try taking a bath with it and Cherino accepts.
desc.zh_cn: 收到{cf洁莉诺}的联系后，老师来到了温泉浴场，并且看见了{cf洁莉诺}的洗澡用「橡胶小鸭」。{cf洁莉诺}耍脾气说自己不喜欢橡胶小鸭，但老师提议她和橡胶小鸭娃娃一起洗澡看看，{cf洁莉诺}接受了提议。

hobby.en: Doling out demerits, purging, snowball fights

desc.en: Sensei and Cherino meet on the walking trail. Cherino wants to award the Hot Springs Department with a medal. A fight soon breaks out when the Hot Springs Department reveals their intention to destroy the Red Winter district.
desc.jp: Sensei and Cherino meet on the walking trail. Cherino wants to award the Hot Springs Department with a medal. A fight soon breaks out when the Hot Springs Department reveals their intention to destroy the Red Winter district.
desc.zh_cn: {cf洁莉诺}和老师在散步路径上再次相遇。由于相当满意227号温泉浴场的服务，{cf洁莉诺}原本打算授予勋章于{cn温泉开发部}，然而当她得知{cn温泉开发部}真正的目的是炸毁整个{sn赤冬}自治区时，她便立即向其宣战。

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: Hot Springs Resort No. 227 Daily Logs!
name.jp: Hot Springs Resort No. 227 Daily Logs!

desc.en: Spec Ops No. 227 find themselves operating a resort when a hot spring is discovered at the Former Institute. Will Nodoka and friends manage to operate the resort despite the constant hurdles and distractions?
desc.jp: Spec Ops No. 227 find themselves operating a resort when a hot spring is discovered at the Former Institute. Will Nodoka and friends manage to operate the resort despite the constant hurdles and distractions?
desc.zh_cn: 由于某天旧校舍突然涌出的温泉，{cn227号特别班}开始经营温泉浴场。面对来访学生们接连引起的混乱，究竟{cf和香}他们能否顺利地经营温泉浴场呢！？

name.en: Hot Springs Resort No. 227 Daily Logs!
name.jp: Hot Springs Resort No. 227 Daily Logs!

desc.en: Spec Ops No. 227 find themselves operating a resort when a hot spring is discovered at the Former Institute. Will Nodoka and friends manage to operate the resort despite the constant hurdles and distractions?
desc.jp: Spec Ops No. 227 find themselves operating a resort when a hot spring is discovered at the Former Institute. Will Nodoka and friends manage to operate the resort despite the constant hurdles and distractions?
desc.zh_cn: 由于某天旧校舍突然涌出的温泉，{cn227号特别班}开始经营温泉浴场。面对来访学生们接连引起的混乱，究竟{cf和香}他们能否顺利地经营温泉浴场呢！？

desc.en: The Hot Springs Department's scheme is stopped in its tracks, but Nodoka is unable to accept the closing of Hot Springs Resort No. 227. The Labor Party joins the fray, and a battle ensues between the students of the Secretariat and those of the Spec Ops.
desc.jp: The Hot Springs Department's scheme is stopped in its tracks, but Nodoka is unable to accept the closing of Hot Springs Resort No. 227. The Labor Party joins the fray, and a battle ensues between the students of the Secretariat and those of the Spec Ops.
desc.zh_cn: 虽然{cf洁莉诺}成功阻止了{cn温泉开发部}的阴谋，但{cf和香}却因无法接受227号温泉浴场即将倒闭的事实，决心推翻{cf洁莉诺}。接受了{cf和香}的雇用后，工务部也跟着加入这场事务局和特别班之间的战斗。

desc.en: Nodoka cries saying that she doesn't want to return to her old life at the Former Institute. Shigure comforts Nodoka, but then the Hot Springs Department reappears and blows Hot Springs Resort No. 227 to smithereens.
desc.jp: Nodoka cries saying that she doesn't want to return to her old life at the Former Institute. Shigure comforts Nodoka, but then the Hot Springs Department reappears and blows Hot Springs Resort No. 227 to smithereens.
desc.zh_cn: 战斗结束后，{cf和香}哭着表示不想再回到从前的生活，而{cf时雨}则在一旁安慰着她。就在众人以为温泉浴场事件总算圆满落幕的时候……{cn温泉开发部}再度现身，并且将227号温泉浴场彻底炸毁。

name.en: A Day in the Life of Red Winter Academy
name.jp: A Day in the Life of Red Winter Academy

desc.en: Shigure discovers the one lone bath that survived the blast intact amidst the ruins of the hot springs resort. The students of Red Winter all cram themselves into the little tub to share a bath and their aspirations.
desc.jp: Shigure discovers the one lone bath that survived the blast intact amidst the ruins of the hot springs resort. The students of Red Winter all cram themselves into the little tub to share a bath and their aspirations.
desc.zh_cn: {cf时雨}在温泉浴场的废墟中发现了一个完好的浴池，于是{sn赤冬}学园的学生们便纷纷挤进那狭小的浴池内，一边泡汤一边向{sn其他}人吐露自己的理想及抱负。

name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

name.en: Hot Springs Resort No. 227 Daily Logs!
name.jp: Hot Springs Resort No. 227 Daily Logs!

desc.en: Spec Ops No. 227 find themselves operating a resort when a hot spring is discovered at the Former Institute. Will Nodoka and friends manage to operate the resort despite the constant hurdles and distractions?
desc.jp: Spec Ops No. 227 find themselves operating a resort when a hot spring is discovered at the Former Institute. Will Nodoka and friends manage to operate the resort despite the constant hurdles and distractions?
desc.zh_cn: 由于某天旧校舍突然涌出的温泉，{cn227号特别班}开始经营温泉浴场。面对来访学生们接连引起的混乱，究竟{cf和香}他们能否顺利地经营温泉浴场呢！？

name.en: Hot Springs Resort No. 227 Daily Logs!
name.jp: Hot Springs Resort No. 227 Daily Logs!

desc.en: Spec Ops No. 227 find themselves operating a resort when a hot spring is discovered at the Former Institute. Will Nodoka and friends manage to operate the resort despite the constant hurdles and distractions?
desc.jp: Spec Ops No. 227 find themselves operating a resort when a hot spring is discovered at the Former Institute. Will Nodoka and friends manage to operate the resort despite the constant hurdles and distractions?
desc.zh_cn: 由于某天旧校舍突然涌出的温泉，{cn227号特别班}开始经营温泉浴场。面对来访学生们接连引起的混乱，究竟{cf和香}他们能否顺利地经营温泉浴场呢！？

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子
